description: For two months, I completed my internship as a developer intern. My main objective was to develop my professional skills, particularly in programming and professional relationships. I designed a web application for container terminal management using React.js, Node.js, and MySQL, allowing me to explore new technologies. In addition to this, I also worked on various office tasks and computer maintenance, as well as field tasks, thus demonstrating my versatility and ability to adapt to any situation.

titled: Second year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI

titled: Third year of professional license in Software and Database Engineering
location: Ecole national d'informatique de Fianarantsoa - ENI
